oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A practical and improved process for the synthesis of Hagen's gland lactones by catalytic hydro-deiodination
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: CHAUDHARI, DA
KATTANGURU, P
FERNANDES, RA
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: PARASITIC WASPS HYMENOPTERA
OLEFIN CROSS-METATHESIS
CHIRON APPROACH
BRACONIDAE
TIN
STEREOCHEMISTRY
CYCLIZATION
STRATEGY
MODEL
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Catalytic hydro-deiodination has been efficiently employed in the development of a benign process for the synthesis of Hagen's gland lactones. The process was developed with only two column chromatographic purifications and is applicable for gram scale synthesis. No protecting groups were used in the synthesis which is an added advantage.
